item.description:
Presentation (5:00 - 6:00 PM) by Louisa Dell'Amico "An Inconvenient Food: The Link Between Animal Agriculture, Global Warming, & Environmental Degradation."
Vegan Dinner (6:15-7:00 PM) MENU: Focaccia with Caramelized Onions; Butternut Squash & Pear Soup; Black Bean, Corn, & Red Pepper Salad; Spinach Lasagne. Your choice of Chocolate Brownie or Ginger-Macadamia-Coconut Carrot Cake. BYO Bottle (of whatever!)
African Drumming and Dancing with ARABALON! 7:00-8:00 PM. COST: $22 Reservation Deadline: 4/18 Make checks payable & mail to: Louisa Dell'Amico, c/o Pines Community Center, PO Box 262, Tilton, NH 03276. For more info: louisa@metrocast.net
item.name: Earth Day Vegan Dinner, African Drumming/Dancing, & Talk: "An Inconvenient Food"
